channel.title: [317] how do i make a donator rank on my server
channel.description:
my server is allstarscape sourced and has no donator rank. ive searched the server tuts and fount about nothing
is there a complete way to add a donator rank

item.title: [317] how do i make a donator rank on my server
item.dc:creator: @gooasco gooasco
item.description:
@gooasco wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:3, topic:351009”][quote author=s p i d a z link=topic=447368.msg3283253#msg3283253 date=1280014698]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I looked for 10 seconds. Use your brain.
[/quote]

i still dont get it im clueless

That’s for a 508.

Declare a method that is set to either true or false and call it Donator. Then make it save into their character file and load when they log on.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: [317] how do i make a donator rank on my server

item.title: [317] how do i make a donator rank on my server
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:8, topic:351009”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=447368.msg3283266#msg3283266 date=1280015585]
well i can tell you this, pk planet has a fully working donator system, with donator only items, a donator cape (with a cash sign) and when they talk there is a red cash sign, yes its 317 with many features, but there is some bugs you have to fix and stuff, (its easy) then its a very good server! just a suggestion
[/quote]
agreed, Its a great starter one. With lots of work, It could be really good.[/quote]

yes there were alot of bugs, like a godsword was 1b in store, and you can buy all 4 of them for 99k in the box set exchange, not much of a bug, but there would be no point of godwars or anything for that, and alot of other box exchange things that could ruin your economy, oh and for the donator store, you have to go into your shops.cfg, go to the last store that says something like @gre box exchanger, then change the number next to (e.g. 15033) and change that to how ever many you want the shop to sell, there are alot more box exchange things like that, but its easy to fix up, and people love going on my server

if your interested in pk planet source (by spy man47) then heres the link to the client and source thread:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


post any replies there for some questions about the server, though some times he will just respond “fix it”

Read full topic
item.source: [317] how do i make a donator rank on my server

drubrkletern:

well i can tell you this, pk planet has a fully working donator system, with donator only items, a donator cape (with a cash sign) and when they talk there is a red cash sign, yes its 317 with many features, but there is some bugs you have to fix and stuff, (its easy) then its a very good server! just a suggestion

agreed, Its a great starter one. With lots of work, It could be really good.

item.source: [317] how do i make a donator rank on my server

item.title: [317] how do i make a donator rank on my server
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

well im not really sure how to do that for 317, but pk planet (317 server) has a fully working donator system, with donator only items, a donator cape (with a cash sign) and when they talk there is a red cash sign, yes its 317 with many features, but there is some bugs you have to fix and stuff, (its easy) then its a very good server! if you want you could just switch to that, and to make someone a donator you just edit their file and for the place that says donator = just put 1 instead of 0 and boom they are donator

Read full topic

item.title: [317] how do i make a donator rank on my server
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:4, topic:351009”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=447368.msg3283256#msg3283256 date=1280014879]

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429746.msg3155487.html#msg3155487

I looked for 10 seconds. Use your brain.

That’s for a 508.

Declare a method that is set to either true or false and call it Donator. Then make it save into their character file and load when they log on.
[/quote]

It doesn’t matter if its for 508 or not, Learn to not copy and paste then. Change the methods your self.[/quote]

But it still made sense to post a 508 tutorial for someone who’s using a 317? You wouldn’t even be changing the methods, you would be changing the whole thing altogether, which is pretty much pointless to look at now because I just told him exactly how to do it in a matter of two sentences.

Read full topic
